website_summaries.verdict: Its sturdy metal rim and fold-flat structure are nice pluses, but this seat’s straps and tethers are a bit flimsy.
pros: Can be folded up and stored easily when not in use
Dogs love being able to see out the car windows, owners report
Metal frame won’t bend when leaned on
cons: Bottom of car seat is unsupported, making some dogs uncomfortable
A few reports of frayed straps and broken tether clips after a few uses

customer_reviews.title: 10 starts!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My HandsomeSamson is SOOOO much happier in his booster seat! He can see out the windows. He HATED the carriers. We have a MUCH MUCH MUCH more pleasant care ride now. The seat is easy to put in & take out of the car. It's material is easy to clean up. I would HIGHLY recommend this booster seat!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Burns

customer_reviews.title: Mostly Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great and I love the color! My dog, Bambi, does really well in it. The bottom does sag after a bit, I wish it were a little sturdier there. Also, if you are questioning which size to get your dog, order up. My 17lb terroir mix has a hard time getting comfortable laying down sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Ila Rose Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: it has worked great for its big enough for both of my little dogs and they seamed comfy
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Had to put three pieces of thick cardboard in seat ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to put three pieces of thick cardboard in seat to keep seat flat. It had been collapsing whenever I put them in it. Bonnie weighs 5.6 lbs. and Ginger weighs 8.3 lbs. (Total weight: 13.9 lbs.) Seat is supposed to hold up to 20 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Lariat

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this seat for months now. I have a 24lb dachshund and he loves it! I place a pillow under it for support. He can sit or lay in it comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: G. Woods

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I got a defected one?
customer_reviews.text: The first use was a bust. The back strap loops that hold the seat belt(and/or the optional strap) unraveled before we got to our ten minute destination. My dog only weighs nine pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Jane

customer_reviews.title: Gives your dog a birds eye view!
customer_reviews.text: Okay I have a 8 pound chihuahua who LOVES to ride up front and watch everything and everyone. This seat is great for her. The seat rises high enough for her to see out the windshield, it has small pockets for storage - personal my cell phone fits in them perfectly. It’s easy to install and take out. I do NOT recommend this for a larger dog. This seat fits any vehicle. I will be buying another one! It’s easy to shake clean - idk about washing yet. There is also a small “leash” attached so your little companion doesn’t/can’t jump out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend, found a safer alternative
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like this car seat for my little shi-poo. It hangs from the seat and so there is not much support on the bottom. Plus the straps get in the way of the dogs head at times. I ended up buying a new car seat that sits on the seat and has no straps to get in the way of the puppy's head. Much prefer it over this one and it has two tethers vs the one tether this one has which I find safer. It is also more stable and doesn't move around like this one does. This moves around more because it hangs there.
customer_reviews.author: Kellymarie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and roomy
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it. She curls up and sleeps throughout the trip. It seems to be good quality and the pockets in front are handy. The back is padded and the seat seems pretty sturdy. This one is the best of the car seats I've bought so far.
customer_reviews.author: E. Louis

customer_reviews.title: Not safe!
customer_reviews.text: I spent the extra (there are many lessor expensive models available on Amazon) because I wanted something safe for my puppy. I made several attempts to use it Over a month. Thought I’d like this car seat for my puppy but it kept twisting and collapsing. Since she was feathered to it with no slack to prevent this from happening...she nearly choked until I could pull off the road and get her out of it! She was 15 lbs at the time. if your dog is already trained to sit in one of these seats, it might work for you, but it is dangerous and not fit for an untrained puppy or dog.
customer_reviews.author: Shirl

customer_reviews.title: The bunny threw me off
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had paid attention to the weight limit. I saw the bunny, and I assume this seat was smaller, but I think because the containment strap can be adjusted it will work. It sits up high in the seat, so it will be great if I can make it work. My dog is a puppy currently, and is not expected to grow larger than 6 lbs. She will swim in this seat! I do have a larger Yorkie that this might work for, if I need to purchase a smaller seat, though, but this seat is very pretty, and nicely constructed. It also secures very nicely to the car. If there is a smaller version, I'd LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: Tami D.

customer_reviews.title: Bought for a small dog- his review? PAWFECT!
customer_reviews.text: My dog rides in the car with me everyday. I bough this for safety, and also to stave off my pets hair form getting on my seats. This thing is great. Easy to install. Little pockets with a zipper area for treats or leash, etc. Best part is you can adjust the height, so now my tiny chihuahua can see out the window. He is even MORE excited to go on trips now. Also has a hook to attach to your dogs collar or harness
customer_reviews.author: cynister25

customer_reviews.title: ok but needs some design changes
customer_reviews.text: 1. it needs removable sherpa - not really comfy. 2. it needs a panel that fits next to the seat back to support it a bit more so it doesn't need something under it to support. 3. I do like the way that you can use your seat belt with it for attaching it to your seat. 4. The short attachment to clip onto your dog's harness is great but it would be nice if you could make it short enough to keep them from twisting all over.
customer_reviews.author: Roxie

customer_reviews.title: The first one I bought several years ago and it has been fantastic. The other I purchases right at a year ...
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these. One for each yorkie. The first one I bought several years ago and it has been fantastic. The other I purchases right at a year ago...and today the clip to hook to the dogs harness broke...there is no way to replace it....does anyone know how I can contact the company to see if they will make this right? We leave in 5 days for a yorkie jamboree thats 4 1/2 hours away...so I am looking at having to purchase another car seat before we leave....not in the budget.....Love the seats, my dogs have loved the seats....but now I need the clasp fixed somehow and I don't know how to contact the company. Anyone???
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly J. Davis

customer_reviews.title: A MUST for car rides!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great booster seat for smaller dogs! My dog loves car rides, and this allows her to be raised up so she can look out the window and have her face in the wind like she loves! She is protected and has a fun car ride as well! We are on our second seat now because when she was a puppy, she chewed on the strap. Now she’s past that chewing stage and I’m guessing this booster will last years. Also easy to clean (hose off) in case of an occasional “accident”.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Miller

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: Not a good dog carrier for me. The straps are in the way and my dog gets tangled up to where I have to pull over and untangle her. She is an 8 lb. Shih Tzu! The interior strap clasp works so hard I had to buy a larger one and attach it so I could hook her in. Finally taken it out of my car and looking for something else. After reading the other reviews about the seat belt straps coming apart I'm not willing to try that. I didn't have trouble installing it and it didn't collapse on me.
customer_reviews.author: Shih Tzu Mom

customer_reviews.title: My little buddy is safer in his own car-seat.
customer_reviews.text: My little Shih Tzu loves his new car seat. He sit's and looks out the window and enjoys riding in the car a lot more. I know his is safer in the seat . I like the security of the seat being securely fastened to the rear seat of our car. The seat is very easy to remove & replace. It only takes about a minute to remove and about two minutes to put it back and securely fasten it in place.
customer_reviews.author: mardon

customer_reviews.title: Good quality booster but not very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The booster does not sit high as expected even with straps shortened, still a bit too low for my dog to look out the window. It looks sturdy and does its job, my dog no longer rolls back and forth during a ride, but if you have the space to store, I think a sofa booster would be much more comfortable as there won’t be diagonal straps all around it. My dog needs to make quite some effort to move pass the straps to reach out to the window.
customer_reviews.author: Buramiko

customer_reviews.title: I cant figure it out for back seat but wanna love it.
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and sturdy but only easy to put in the front seat (which is the airbags I'm trying to avoid). I think its really cute but if you don't have a headrest in the back seat and most cars do not, then it collapses. Maybe, I'm not doing it, right? I love this and wanna use it and give a higher review but I'm not able to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlet J.

customer_reviews.title: Love this seat!
customer_reviews.text: This booster is perfect for my 11 pound Boston Terrier. The little guy loves being able to see over the windows, and it feels very secure whether he is in the front or backseat. Warning: don't forget to turn off your passenger side airbags if you sit your pet upfront -- a tiny dog may be killed from the impact (same reason you don't put small children in the front seat... better yet, attach this seat to the back.) In any case, the seat perfectly coordinates with my red convertible so it looks ultra cool! This is my third auto seat, and so far my favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Gwenevere

customer_reviews.title: absolutely worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: This seat helped cure my 4lb Yorkie’s car sickness! Having it up high enough for her to see out the window, as suggested by my vet, seemed to be all she needed! Now not only is she safe in the car but no longer gets sick! Win-win situation! The quality of this seat for the very reasonable price is outstanding. We have had it for months now & it shows no signs of wear. It is easily cleaned with a damp cloth if need be. I store her leads, poop bags, & a few DreamBones in the front pockets. I pair the seat with a Kurgo crash tested harness for maximum safety. She even shares it on occasion!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for a booster for my puppy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice booster seat with a fairly nice tether to hold the puppy in place. Not sure that the tether will save the puppy in an accident, but it does seam to keep her secured as we travel.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my pug (about 13 pounds). I've actually had two small dogs in it (the second dog is about 10 lbs) and it held both just fine. I like that I can raise it to a height that she can see out the window. It attached to the seat securely and the hook inside for a harness/seat belt is a plus. I've had to readjust it a couple of times as it seems to eventually slide a bit lower, but other than that it has been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lark

customer_reviews.title: Great for Subaru Outback
customer_reviews.text: Great car seat for the price. I love that it lifts my dog up a little higher so that she can look out the window. I do recommend putting a blanket or crate pad in the bottom because it is not well padded. I also recommend attaching the leash to a harness on your dog instead of the dog's collar. Easy to install and move around to different seats. I have a Subaru Outback and it fit perfectly in the front or back seat.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Mecca

customer_reviews.title: these car seats are amazing. my dogs love that they have their own ...
customer_reviews.text: i'm not sure who likes their seats more.. my dogs, or me! these car seats are amazing. my dogs love that they have their own space and i love that they're safe and buckled in! they both weigh between 10-12 pounds so I did have to put a box underneath each seat otherwise the seat would fall and they wouldn't be able to see out the window. i would also suggest buying your dog a harness to strap them in because it's a lot safer than locking them in by their collar. i'm happy i bought! i'd definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: tm bubick

customer_reviews.title: Two 10 pound dogs fit comfortably for a secure ride for your fur babies.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for our ShihTzus so they could ride with us safely. They both fit in it fine and it didn’t sag. They enjoyed their ride being able to see out all the windows. There is one security clip to hold the dogs in. I just attached a splitter so they could both be harnessed into the seat. There are three straps you can use, and can also attach it with the seatbelt on the car. I like that it was strapped in snug and firm and didn’t budge at all. Husband didn’t like that they got the front seat and he got back. 😂😂😂
customer_reviews.author: KristinaS71

customer_reviews.title: A bit awkward but works well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 15 lb Chihuahua/Rat Terrier mix. The seat was easy to put in and take out of vehicle once adjusted. It is a bit awkward putting her in and taking her out of seat due to the strap that goes around headrest but so far it works well. It is nice to have peace of mind she is secured and can be my ride buddy! She enjoys being able to see out. Seat bottom seems sturdy enough for her but I put a pillow underneath just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Regina D.

customer_reviews.title: She may get better as she gets older at not getting tangled
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I have with this is the strap that you attach the harness to keeps getting wrapped around my puppies neck when she changes positions and I have to fix it while I am driving so she won't choke. Luckily I can do this one handed and without taking my eyes off the road. She may get better as she gets older at not getting tangled. She has to sit in the passenger seat so I can reach her. It is made well and very sturdy and it keeps her from running all over the car.
customer_reviews.author: Anne M. Mitts

customer_reviews.title: Furbabies love it.
customer_reviews.text: Furbabies love riding in this seat. Allows them to look out the window. And I can still pet them. Much better than a kennel.
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price. My dogs are about 8-11 pounds. The seat for the heavier dog has a bit of warping on the bottom from his weight, but I don't mind it. They're easy to put on and take off. My dogs love their seats because they can see out the window. It's much safer than having them bouncing around in them car while it drive. I would definitely repurchase them. Just make sure you attach it to a harness rather than their collar so they don't choke themselves trying to get out or getting close to the window.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is perfection. My 9 lb Pomeranian sits in it comfortable and can even lay down. I love that she can see over when sitting but when she lays down she can peek at me through the mesh sides. So far it's holding up well. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Very Well Made!!
customer_reviews.text: very sturdy, well made! Clip to attach to collar/harness is metal and NOT flimsy plastic, I had another seat for my 10 pound Chihuahua mix but, even though it said for "Up to 15 pounds", the canvas seams ripped and pulled out. This Dog Seat is very well made, the "seat" area is big enough that my Gizzy Girl can curl up comfortably and sleep. Gizzy can, once again, ride comfortably, safely, and from a seat that she can see out of the windows. Thank you for making a Good Safe seat for my baby!
customer_reviews.author: yepiboughtit

customer_reviews.title: Love this car seat
customer_reviews.text: Love this car seat. I put a folded blanket underneath to help bring it up a little. I put 2 Cavaliers in it at one time, they love it. They can see out the window now. They look soooo cute sitting in it. When I had to take one to the vet, she is still a puppy, but she sat so nice in it and doesn't try to climb out at all, because she loves it. Highly recommend this product. Linda
customer_reviews.author: Linda Heus

customer_reviews.title: As expected.
customer_reviews.text: I just got this today but I’ve already tested it. Easy to install seems very sturdy. Currently only my 8pbs chihuahua has ridden in it. It would easily fit another dog his size in it. He loves that it’s high enough to see out the window. And for your viewing pleasure, I’ve attached a picture of my precious Chico bonito Rodriquez.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have a 4lb Yorkie and this is so great! She wasn't sure of it at first
customer_reviews.text: I have a 4lb Yorkie and this is so great! She wasn't sure of it at first, but now she can see out the window and loves it. It took a few minutes to get it installed to the right height (the straps are adjustable). I also used the regular seat belt in the back loops so it doesn't move at all. The seat seems to be well made and I would recommend this product for small dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great doggy car seat for small dogs!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this doggy car seat! And more importantly, my Pomeranian puppy loves it. She can move around and see out, but can't jump out because of the tether that hooks to her collar. It's really important that the sides are mesh because she can lay down and still see out so that she doesn't feel alone. I'm surprised at how many doggy car seats I looked at that were solid on all four sides--not good! The front bar is sturdy and does not collapse when she stands on it to look out. The pockets on the front are really nice to have to be able to store treats, toys, etc.
customer_reviews.author: J. White

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good. I feel that it serves its purpose, I think that my pup is just growing faster than expected :). It can be a little awkward putting them in with the front straps up, so I just wait to put them around the headrest until after he’s in the seat. Also I recommend to put a small/thin throw blanket or towel down because the liner was a bit slippery for my pooch
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M. Torres-delgado

customer_reviews.title: happy dog
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with this purchase; it is easy to adjust and install. It seems to be sturdy and well made. My dog is happy with it! And, I have already recommended this item to another person
customer_reviews.author: KAREN

customer_reviews.title: Pup approved! :)))
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this seat. She gets very nervous in the seats that she cannot see out the window. This one can be adjusted higher so she can look out the window but the security leash is adjustable so she can’t hang out too far which is perfect. It installed quickly and is very secure. It can also be taken in and out easily which is important for me. 5 out of 5 for sure!
customer_reviews.author: VanahSlone

customer_reviews.title: Great Car Seat
customer_reviews.text: This is our 3rd one! One for Grandma and Grandpa's car. He loves riding it in at night. He's 16 lbs, I would not go much heavier than that. I put a pillow and blanket in it to make it more comfy. Very sturdy, highly recommend this car seat. Easy to take in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Hans A.

customer_reviews.title: Best car seat I have used
customer_reviews.text: By far the best dog seat I've found because it sits up high so she can see out the windows for less anxiety, there is space below for me to put things, and it folds right up flat without even removing it so I can put things in the seat or someone in the seat without removing it but very sturdy for my dog. The extra strap enclosed goes around the middle of the seat for safety and there is a tiny strap to clip to her collar to keep her stabilized and in the car seat yet with full view of me and the ride
customer_reviews.author: TheGremlin

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. My doggie loves to look out the window on super short and really long trips and everything in between. It's perfect for him. He weighs 15 lbs and it holds him with ease. Very secure system holding the seat up and to the car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: Boston Terrier calls shot gun!!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I am a pet nerd and ordered this for my Boston Terrier! You can adjust the height . My puppy took right to it. If you don't have your dog with you, it comes off easily or you can spin it around to the backside of the passenger seat to get temporary space on the seat. My little man sits right by me so I can pet him while I drive and he stays out of trouble! Fun product!
customer_reviews.author: beachlover

customer_reviews.title: dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: my dog loves to sit in this seat and look out the window. very well constructed. I am very pleased and so is my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. My 11lb shih szu easily adjusted to it. She likes to look out the window and see everything and this was perfect for that. I don’t think the bottom part is made for any more weight than that. It is a bit flimsy but not horrible. I put a blanket on top of it, for my dog. The strap that goes around the seat is too short. So i just don’t use that. But this could be dangerous on turns and car accidents because the seat would tip over. Overall the seat is nice looking and is good. Durable so far. I recommend this for small dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: He’s close to me and buckled in and safe.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it!!!!! I take my baby everywhere I go and he’s right up front next to me buckled in. He can look out the windows and he can take a nap lots of room to lay down if he wants.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy E Shores

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: Our small dog gets car sick unless she is sitting on my lap. We bought this booster seat for her and drove 23 hours one way and 23 hours back. Minnie (our dog) never got sick once. It took a few times for her to get used to it. First we placed her in it in our living room and gave her treats. We put her in it the truck and then finally drove around the block. It worked GREAT!! (We saw booster seats on the show Lucky Dog. So glad we did. It helped a lot)
customer_reviews.author: Tricia O.

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: This is a great seat. I have ordered 2. The first one came boxed without a problem. Unfortunately the second one was shipped in a bag and arrived with a broken bucket. After several emails I was reimbursed for it. I have 2 small Jack Russell and they love the seats. They allow them to travel safely and see out the window
customer_reviews.author: wanda

customer_reviews.title: Dogs need time to adjust
customer_reviews.text: The seat is well made...sturdy and of good quality...just don’t expect to your dog riding in it right away. Dogs need time to adjust and whatever you do don’t feed your dog first!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rubio

customer_reviews.title: awesome car booster.
customer_reviews.text: easy to assemble and fit right into my front sea of my Honda CRV, you just adjust the seat to be straight and my pup is small enough that she sees everything over the dashboard of my car. you have 2 clip to make sure that the dog is in place. recommended. the pink is very cute and you have pocket in the front.
customer_reviews.author: laricath

customer_reviews.title: What the hee?...let me see...wow! Love the view...tuckered out on way home!
customer_reviews.text: Harmony wasn't quite sure what to think about this car seat. So, she checks it out! We went for a ride to grandma's house. Wow...she's thinking! Not bad...I can see lights, cars, people, kids, trucks, motorcycles! Love the view. Tuckered out on the way home! I love it, she loves it. (she weighs 15 pounds). It's sturdy, durable, and you can't beat this for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: I love it! My puppy is maybe 5 pounds and ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it! My puppy is maybe 5 pounds and it holds her just fine but we will see how it works out when she gets bigger. Love that it has a leash connector because she constantly tries to come lay on my lap while I'm driving. Love that the sides are mesh so I can see her when she lies down. I did think it was going to be deeper but it still works out. Haven't had any issues with it. Easy to take off and put back on.
customer_reviews.author: kw4

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 7.5lb Chihuahua mix. It's the perfect size for her. She can stand and look out the windows and has plenty of room to turn around or lay down. Instillation is very easy, and it can be taken out of the car very quickly if I need the extra seat for a passenger. Folds up flat and comes with a nice little plastic case with a handle on it for storage. This is just what I was looking for and I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: L. Green

customer_reviews.title: Makes car rides so much easier!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted!! I was looking for something my dog could sit and be strapped to while in the car so he wouldn’t try to crawl onto my lap while I was driving. I also wanted something to elevate him higher so he could look out the window. This does both and works perfect! I love how easy it is to put on the seat and take off when he’s not riding with me. He loves it and it helped him love car rides.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: not working for my dog. plus they want me ...
customer_reviews.text: not working for my dog. plus they want me to pay for shipping to return it. I've never had to pay for any returned items to Amazon. Now I am stuck with this product which doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: mbs

customer_reviews.title: She is pretty small (10 pounds) and would slip and slide on ...
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed for my toy Australian shepherd. She is pretty small (10 pounds) and would slip and slide on my leather car seats. Now she jumps right into her seat and can look out the window. Also, I know she is safe if I need to brake quickly and she isn't jumping into my lap every chance she gets. I would definitely recommend this seat to anyone who likes to bring their little dog with them in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Ann E. Godden

customer_reviews.title: Works ok but strap can easily be chewed by dog
customer_reviews.text: Item is not bad for the price, I am a bit disappointed that my small dog has been able to easily chew through some of the strap that holds the item upright. I intended to purchase a better quality item but all seemed too bulky. I can see this items strap breaking off soon and will not be usable anymore after that, would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Great way for my Poodle to Ride
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about purchasing a car seat for our 2-year-old Poodle. However, he loves to ride with us. I had looked at similar car seats at local pet stores and found them rather expensive. When this one arrived, I still wasn't sure. It was really easy to put on the seat to make sure he was locked in. He was a little skeptical about this as well. By the second ride, he was real comfortable and not concerned at all about falling out. He likes to look outside when riding and this car seat allows him this treat. Now, when we go for rides, he's eager to jump in his car seat to go with us.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Cute but Unsafe !!
customer_reviews.text: I had to return it - it's unsafe. My nine pound Poodle got her leg wrapped around the front strap and it was difficult to extricate her leg as it was around it three turns. Also the seat clip is very flimsy and difficult to hook onto the dogs harness.
customer_reviews.author: Gran97

customer_reviews.title: and this can hold it's shape and work like a basket
customer_reviews.text: i have own many pet car seats, and this can hold it's shape and work like a basket, not a sloped bag like the others. I also love the utility pockets on the seat, my puppy is smart enough to climb out and grab those snacks in those pocket but its so cute to see and very useful to place water bottle, food, peepee pads etc.
customer_reviews.author: Chau Yung Ke Fiona

customer_reviews.title: They can see out!
customer_reviews.text: My oldest loves it! He can see it the window now. He's 23 lbs and it holds him up just great! My girl has always been antsy in the car and wants to be on my lap. She's getting used to it. She's only 13 lbs. She too can see out. It's perfect for both of them.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole BC

customer_reviews.title: Good quality just no match for my mini schnauzers teeth
customer_reviews.text: ok so I didnt get to actually utilize this product due to having a dog that feels it is his job to free every animal in the WORLD! It was on the seat for all of 10mins and He chewed every strap because it was hanging on "his" seat... I do think it would have worked well though! Good quality just no match for my mini schnauzers teeth, would love to purchace again but will have to search for one with leather straps so it lasts longer then the time it takes me to put gas in the car
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne P

customer_reviews.title: Great for car trips
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8 pound Chihuahua. It keeps her from crawling all over me while I drive, and she has plenty of room to snuggle down and sleep or look out the window if she wants to. It can securely hook to your seat with the seatbelt through the back. The frame seems sturdy, and the fabric is easily wiped clean. My mom liked it so much she ordered one for her little dog!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving this booster car seat and the pink color is gorgeous. I've been waiting for the pink to be back in stock. This car seat is perfect for my 5lb girl and I love that she can see out the window. There's also room for her sister when we pick her up for play dates. I got the extra support for it just in case, but it already had a nice firm bottom. I am definitely more than pleased with my purchase. :)
customer_reviews.author: Michi915

customer_reviews.title: Absoulety buy this
customer_reviews.text: I love this seat! It is very easy to install and it keeps my baby safe while he is riding in the car with me. My biggest concern was finding something that would prevent the airbag from hurting my baby if it did ever deploy and this eat is wonderful as it sits above the seat cushion raising the dog up to a safe level which protects against the airbag. I have a 3 month old, 6 pound puppy, and he has room to move around, sit, lay, and even chew on his favorite toy. Great for smaller dogs
customer_reviews.author: Megan Rheanna

customer_reviews.title: Clips on product are poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This Booster Car Seat arrived broken. The security clip that attaches the seat to the car headrest was broken upon arrival and I imagine by looking at the quality of the construction, it would have broken within days from the weight of our dog (15lbs). I am very disappointed in this product. This is one of the reasons I despise online shopping. I am going back to basics and visiting my local pet store so I can actually confirm a product is well-made before purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Clark

customer_reviews.title: I love this doggie car seat
customer_reviews.text: I love this doggie car seat! So far, my dog prefers being under the seat to being IN the seat, but she will happily return to the seat when prompted. She appreciates the ability to see what's outside, which cuts down on the amount of barking and whining from the back seat.
customer_reviews.author: Donetta

customer_reviews.title: Love this.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my Yorkie. I feel it is as safe as I can possibly keep him when I'm driving. It puts him up high enough so he can see more things. It is, also, very sturdy, washable and with all the straps, seatbelt and short strap to hook onto his harness, it does not move if I stop suddenly. I put the puppy bed in it and hook him into it and he is quite calm for the entire trip. I'm new to having a pet and this is the best idea of the many that I initially came up with. I've even had others look at it and ask where I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my new puppy and was so exited to use it! She seemed to love riding in it the few times we were able to use it. However, after riding in it only a few times she was able to chew through the strap that is supposed to hold her in. She is not very big and not a big chewer and the car rides were under 1/2 hour each so I was very surprised she was able to get through the straps so quickly. For the price you would expect something much more durable!
customer_reviews.author: amy michl

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Dog hates it, nothing keeping your furry friend from flying out of it. Shame it was great in theory
customer_reviews.author: Glamournaut

customer_reviews.title: I consider this a bad investment with a dangerous potential
customer_reviews.text: This product's straps frayed after only 4 months use. My chihuahua weighs 7/5 lbs. there is no reason for straps to fail. I consider this a bad investment with a dangerous potential.
customer_reviews.author: Pilar Ortiz-Groseclose

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but inconvenient placement of straps.
customer_reviews.text: This doggie car seat was very well made, and attractive, and appeared to be comfortable. However, the placement of the straps was very inconvenient. It was difficult to get even my small dog in and out of the seat without having to twist her body sideways. For this reason I have returned this seat to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: mikeysmom

customer_reviews.title: Function
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for our dogs for a trip we were taking. The problem I had with this, was the front part would sag downward.The sides and the back were ok, but the front would sag and the dogs would struggle to try and get out and they would choke themselves
customer_reviews.author: Theresa fain

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your $$$
customer_reviews.text: Less than 2 months after receiving this car seat, my 2 1/2 pound dog had broken the security restraining strap. Returns are allowed for only 4 weeks so I am out a bunch of money. Don't waste your $$$. Not so DELUXE!
customer_reviews.author: m. fairley

customer_reviews.title: Attachment for harness broke
customer_reviews.text: I loved the seat at first. My dog was comfortable all the way down on our 9 hour trip. On the way back, however, I went to unhook her harness from the seat at a bathroom stop and found that the hook was no longer attached to the car seat. It had been sewn in and just fell out. Lola was very calm while travelling so it was not because she was pulling. And my trip was after the 30 day return period, so I now have a broken car seat.
customer_reviews.author: tammy owens

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We got this seat for our 13 pound chihuahua mix. We love it! It props her up so she gets more air from the ac. We love that it's secured to the seat of the car and we can actually buckle her harness in. She seems really comfortable in it and we feel safer driving with her in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Linda J Falkenberg

customer_reviews.title: Great Seat
customer_reviews.text: I love this booster. I have a 9lb. Shih Tzu who will break his neck trying to stand up and see the traffic out the car windows. The booster is high enough and big enough that he can sit and see everything plus nap. We take a lot of road trips so I let him freely jump in and out usually.
customer_reviews.author: Zi

customer_reviews.title: Good product if your dog is well trained
customer_reviews.text: It works well and is steady, but my puppies can jump right out and they're mini dachshunds so they're very tiny. Good product if your dog is well trained, not the best for a curious pup
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The straps would not tighten enough to get the seat ...
customer_reviews.text: The straps would not tighten enough to get the seat elevated off the car seat so the dog could see out so I hag to tie the straps in knots to get them to work. This makes it extremely difficult to get the seat in and out for a passenger. I had to buy a dog bed for the bottom because there was no cushion. I have a 15 pound dog, which the instructions said this would hold, but she had to curl up in it be able to get her head in to lay down. Now I'll have to try to sell or throw this one away and start over.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice high quality, great value, fits my car and my little one perfect. Especially live the seatbelt to keep her secure and safe.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: A bit too small for my 23lb Shih Tzu. He doesn’t seem to be able to find a comfortable way to sit in it.
customer_reviews.author: KLF

customer_reviews.title: Perfect seat for a cat or small dog!!
customer_reviews.text: My crazy cat loves this seat! It's very sturdy and has 3 different straps to anchor the seat firmly into the car. Well made! I was very impressed by the quality. My cat is a diva so, I put a fluffy bath mat in the bottom and she snuggled right in. 3 hour trip to Kentucky and she was happy as a clam. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Sterf C.

customer_reviews.title: love love love this
customer_reviews.text: love love love this, this is my second car seat (one for each car) from this maker and its the only one I would recommend! I ordered a seemingly similar seat awhile back when this one was out of stock & we didnt keep it, this one fits our poodle (9 lbs) perfectly! It allows her to see out while feeling secure, lay down completely & comfortably on long trips, and has cured her traveling anxiety! Thank you for this product!
customer_reviews.author: sheila coffman

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Much safer than letting them roam the car, and easy to use! It is adjustable to the seat and has a clip that attaches to her harness. The seatbelt goes through hoops on the back or you can use the strap it comes with around the seat of the car to secure the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: It does it’s job
customer_reviews.text: As advertised... feels sturdy and my 6 lb puppy seems to like it? We shall see how well it holds up Over the next few months... hopefully she doesn’t chew the straps off.
customer_reviews.author: myrah Chappell

customer_reviews.title: My Fur Baby Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old Maltese got this for her birthday! She loves riding in it and looking out of the window and doesn't mind that she isn't riding in my lap anymore! The groomers came out when I picked her up last Saturday to take pictures of it and will be buying some for their doggy boutique in their shop!👍🏽👍🏽💝✌🏽️👌🏾
customer_reviews.author: LisaMoon

customer_reviews.title: Makes car rides easier than ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Car rides use to be such a pain with my pups but ever since we got our booster seat life is so much easier! It’s the perfect size for my pomeranians, sturdy, secure & raised enough so they can still see out the window. Install isn’t too bad either. I have tried other car seats in the past but never had one this great. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and pretty..
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, pretty car seat. Very easy to install in the car. Downside is Sophie Schnoodle hates it so far because nothing good has ever come from a road trip. In her 8 months every one has ended at the vet or the groomer. Last trip - to the pet store - she only cried halfway and discovered she could see out ... I'm optimistic..
customer_reviews.author: Ljane

customer_reviews.title: Very Secure -  Must Have
customer_reviews.text: Absolute a Must Have. My dog sits high enough to look out windows and has plenty of room to lie down to nap. The seat is securely held in place with the use of the car's seatbelt (loops on the back of the dog car seat) and the dog is held securely by a clip that attaches to her collar. Love this product - no dog should travel unprotected !!
customer_reviews.author: krecky

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: My little chihuahua loves it. It saves me from distraction while driving knowing she is secure in her own seat.
customer_reviews.author: Genie R

customer_reviews.title: Definetly for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2. The one for my 9lb dog works great and she loves it. The other for my 15lb dog is not working because he is too big to get in and out of easily. Once he's in, it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy quick install
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 chihuahua and only purchased one booster car seat. My babies are very SAFE and happy. They like being able look out the window. The safety adjustable secure strap allows me to roll down the window. Only thing is now I am going to buy another booster car seat so they don't have to take turns. Easy install and if I do need to remove the car seat it is very easy and folds flat.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Stitching is very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Stitching is very loose. Had to reinforce all seams after thread unraveled within 30 days of purchase. For your dog's safety, do NOT put your dog in this unless you reinforce stitching.
customer_reviews.author: Out of the Cocoon

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it too
customer_reviews.text: The doggie seat can also mount on the back of the seat in my van. The dog loves that because then she can still be close to me. It also leaves the front passenger seat available for people. The safety belt clip has a swivel joint so that it doesn't twist up. The pockets in front are a smart addition.
customer_reviews.author: Hector and Maria

customer_reviews.title: Makes my baby safe
customer_reviews.text: This is just the right size for my baby girl nothing is more important to me then her safety.....she doesn't like it but that's because shes so used to sitting in my lap but anywhere she goes with me she will ride in this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Ray

customer_reviews.title: Dog Booster Seat
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice booster seat which I use for my Maltese puppy. She used to get sick every time we were in the car and in her pet carrier. Now that she can safely move around (she's tethered to the seat) and see outside, as well as to lie down, she seems to enjoy going for a car ride.
customer_reviews.author: Marie A.

customer_reviews.title: Cute, sturdy and easy to install!
customer_reviews.text: I use this car seat for my mini Havanese (5 lb) puppy. I installed it quickly, it’s sturdy and cute!! The most important features are the safety hook that latches onto her harness and the fact that you can slip the car seat off in seconds when you want to use the front seat for human passengers!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are the best ever invention for a small dog and their rides
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, one for me and a friend. We both have two small breeds, 13 lbs each. They are the best ever invention for a small dog and their rides!! My puppy has never sat anywhere else and she sleeps, eats and enjoys looking out the window on all her rides.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, it’s alright
customer_reviews.text: Pretty pricey. No cheap material odor. It elevates my dog’s vision while riding but it doesn’t really stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Bunnie Bun

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my little Gidget. I put a pillow in the bottom of it so she could see out better, but the product is great!!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Evitts

product_meta.title: HDP Car Deluxe Lookout Booster Car Seat
product_meta.description:
Color:PinkSuper Quality with great styleSize 15" Width x 12" Length x 9" Height for pets up to 20Lb (Model Dog is about 17Lb Model Rabbit Is 4Lb)
Can be used well for both sizes.
Lightweight and Washable. 600 denier polyester

This practical car booster seat is the ultimate solution to safely satisfy your dog"s natural urge to look out the window while riding in your car. Attaches in seconds to the passenger seat of most automobiles for a safe and comfortable ride for small dogs. Adjustable straps attach to car seat headrest and around seat.
Also allows for height adjustment.
- Safety strap attaches to harness or a pet collar.
- Folds to 2.5" for compact, easy storage.
- Metal Frame will not allow the seat to collapse
- Padded Hard bottom
- Extra pockets
Care Instructions: Hand wash with cool water. Scrub stains with mild detergent. Line dry.
feature_bullets: Safety strap attaches to harness or a pet collar
Folds to 2.5" for compact, easy storage
Metal Frame will not allow the seat to collapse

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
